slides.heading: CMS
slides.text: SvelteCMS lives in your repository and runs on your website.

icon.alt: SvelteCMS is your content management system

slides.heading: content
slides.text: SvelteCMS stores your content in markdown files, JSON objects, or databases; mix, match, and even migrate[*](#_){.fn} between providers with ease.

slides.heading: hosting
slides.text: Build static, dynamic, or hybrid sites that can be hosted on any provider.

icon.alt: SvelteCMS lets you choose your hosting provider

slides.heading: media
slides.text: SvelteCMS integrates seamlessly[*](#_){.fn}  with many[*](#_){.fn} storage and streaming providers, taking the hassle out of managing your media.

icon.alt: SvelteCMS helps you manage your media

slides.heading: prototypes
slides.text: SvelteCMS builds speedy web apps with complex custom data structures --- *no[*](#_){.fn} coding necessary*.

icon.alt: SvelteCMS gets your project up and running quickly

slides.heading: plugins
slides.text: Extend SvelteCMS functionality with an ecosystem[*](#_){.fn} of plugins, or use its stable[*](#_){.fn} and elegant[*](#_){.fn} API to build your own.

icon.alt: SvelteCMS has a powerful system for plugins

slides.heading: tooling
slides.text: SvelteCMS lets you use the tools you know: Svelte components, markdown, tailwind[*](#_){.fn}, sass[*](#_){.fn}, or even plain old HTML and CSS.

icon.alt: SvelteCMS lets you use your coding tools

slides.heading: budget
slides.text: SvelteCMS is *100% free and open source* --- and it always will be!
